医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的斑马鱼异种移植平台可以帮助筛选胶质母细胞瘤治疗方法根据格哈特和德斯梅特实验室在《EMBO 分子医学》上发表的一项新研究，科学家们创建了一个新的斑马鱼异种移植平台，用于筛选一种名为胶质母细胞瘤的侵袭性脑肿瘤的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-zebrafish-xenograft-platform-could-help-screen-for-glioblastoma-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-zebrafish-xenograft-platform-could-help-screen-for-glioblastoma-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c47420b0-3e83-4ccc-9066-56499183d622 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:51:27 -0400 New zebrafish xenograft platform could help screen for glioblastoma treatments
研究表明癌症肿瘤劫持了神经发育的遗传程序癌症肿瘤“劫持”了正在发育的神经所使用的遗传程序。瑞典于默奥大学研究人员的一项研究表明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Cancer-tumors-hijack-genic-program-of-developing-nerves-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Cancer-tumors-hijack-genic-program-of-developing-nerves-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f22bfa9e-fa0b-4ff1-8fdf-ec783d3b373a Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:15:39 -0400 Cancer tumors hijack genetic program of developing nerves, study shows
AI 模型结合成像和患者数据来改善胸部 X 光诊断根据北美放射学会杂志《放射学》上发表的一项研究，一种新的人工智能 (AI) 模型将成像信息与临床患者数据相结合，以提高胸部 X 光的诊断性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/AI-model-combines-imaging-and-patent-data-to-improve-chest-X-ray-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/AI-model-combines-imaging-and-patent-data-to-improve-chest-X-ray-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89051757-74c4-4fed-ae8d-d93e2c428c0b Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:08:21 -0400 AI model combines imaging and patient data to improve chest X-ray diagnosis
母乳喂养政策可能会让母亲付出高昂的代价世界卫生组织和疾病控制与预防中心发起的运动称，乳房是最好的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Breastfeeding-policies-may-come-at-a-steep-cost-for-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Breastfeeding-policies-may-come-at-a-steep-cost-for-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83ed2402-8ebf-4672-8e74-564a0d367a7a Wed, 04 Oct 2023 23:04:11 -0400 Breastfeeding policies may come at a steep cost for mothers
新设备模拟人类多个器官的疾病想象一下一个比幼儿鞋盒还小的设备，可以在多个器官中模拟任何人类疾病或测试新药物，而无需进入——；或伤害-；身体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-device-simulates- human-diseases-in-multiple-organs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-device-simulates- human-diseases-in-multiple-organs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=535e8323-fc7b-4825-a8f5-614a93ab8327 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 22:45:13 -0400 New device simulates human diseases in multiple organs
研究发现自大流行开始以来儿童和青少年的心理健康支出有所增加兰德公司的一项新研究显示，自 COVID-19 大流行开始以来，儿童和青少年的心理健康服务支出增加了四分之一以上，尽管远程医疗的使用已趋于稳定，但这一支出仍在继续增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-finds-increase-in-mental-health-spending-for-children-adolescents-since-the-beginning-of-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-finds-increase-in-mental-health-spending-for-children-adolescents-since-the-beginning-of-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e61703-1666-48a3-9daf-7d2287433431 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 22:35:57 -0400 Study finds increase in mental health spending for children, adolescents since the beginning of pandemic
社会保障负责人下令对福利超额支付进行广泛审查负责监督社会保障的联邦机构今天宣布，将审查其处理“超额付款”的方式，即向受益人发送后来确定他们无权接收的资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Social-Security-chief-orders-broad-review-of-benefit-over payments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Social-Security-chief-orders-broad-review-of-benefit-over payments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78cc3d9c-ec24-4d31-84ba-4154a40fbe78 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 22:15:00 -0400 Social Security chief orders broad review of benefit overpayments
研究发现，独立医生在 COVID-19 期间的实践更具弹性大型卫生系统正在以惊人的速度收购规模较小的医生诊所，从而留下更少的独立诊所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Independent-physical-practices-more-resilient-during-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Independent-physical-practices-more-resilient-during-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21478ffb-f8e2-4bf6-ae68-5330a4691a13 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 22:12:02 -0400 Independent physician practices more resilient during COVID-19, study finds
适合步行的社区可降低女性患肥胖相关癌症的风险哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究表明，居住在更适合步行的社区可以降低女性患整体肥胖相关癌症的风险，特别是绝经后乳腺癌，还可以预防卵巢癌、子宫内膜癌和多发性骨髓瘤。纽约大学格罗斯曼医学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Walkable-neighborhoods-reduce-risk-of-obesity-lated-cancers-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Walkable-neighborhoods-reduce-risk-of-obesity-lated-cancers-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18f40ba4-f844-4384-ac1f-66efb4731540 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:54:40 -0400 Walkable neighborhoods reduce risk of obesity-related cancers in women
突破性研究侧重于大脑健康监测、神经退行性疾病的早期检测奥卢大学副教授 Teemu Myllylä 是生物医学工程领域的领先专家，他最近在最近的 6G 支持的可持续社会活动中讨论了他的团队在大脑健康监测和神经退行性疾病早期检测方面的开创性工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Groundwriting-research-focuses-on-brain-health-monitoring-early-detection-of-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Groundwriting-research-focuses-on-brain-health-monitoring-early-detection-of-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2903123-57f6-4af4-989b-54cf35fdb065 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 21:46:40 -0400 Groundbreaking research focuses on brain health monitoring, early detection of neurodegenerative diseases
